mapper.insert: insert into location(id, name, level, sequence_number, root_id, organization_id, status) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{level}, #{sequenceNumber}, #{rootId}, #{organizationId}, #{status, typeHandler=com.sybd.znld.mapper.EnumTypeHandler});
mapper.select: select * from location where organization_id = #{organId} and name = #{name};
select * from location where organization_id = #{organId} and level = 1;
select * from location where organization_id = #{organId} and level = 1 and name = #{name};

with cte as (select * from location where id = #{parentId}) select * from location where organization_id = (select organization_id from cte limit 1) and sequence_number > (select sequence_number from cte limit 1);

with cte as (select * from location where id = #{parentId}) select * from location where organization_id = (select organization_id from cte limit 1) and sequence_number > (select sequence_number from cte limit 1) and level = (select level from cte limit 1) + 1;
